Text:
Holy kingdom [*] of the Redeemer
	our promise from heaven,
	and guiding star of the seas.
Assist those who have fallen,
	yet desire to rise again.

Kingdom borne by the holy creator,
	while all creation marveled,
	and You proclaimed good news.
Accepting with praise Christ's Kingdom invitation,
have mercy on us sinners.
Changes: 2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Update the casing of Gods pronouns.
2023-04-06 - Paul Prins: Refined to more closely align with its Marian antiphon.
2022-08-31 - Paul Prins, Jordan Prins: Created this Antiphon.
